page.title: 20CHILBOLTON COMMON SURVEY-3
page.content:
4.How far have you come:- a) Local 17 people b) 5 miles 6 people c) 10 miles 3 people d) 20 miles 3 people e) Futher nil
_____CONCLUSIONS_____
AFTER LOOKING AT THE RESULTS, I CAME TO THE CONCLUSION THAT MOST PEOPLE CAME TO THE COMMON TO WALK OR EXERCISE THEIR DOGS. MOST CAME BECAUSE THEY LIVE NEARBY. THE MAJORITY CAME 2 OR 3 TIMES A YEAR. MORE THAN HALF OF THE VISITORS LIVED LOCALLY. THIS CONCLUSION IS PARTICULAR TO THESE TWO DAYS. AT OTHER TIMES THE RESULTS MIGHT BE COMPLETELY DIFFERENT. I WAS SURPRISED THAT 3 PEOPLE HAD TRAVELLED 20 MILES TO THE COMMON.
